page.title: 12Scott Kilpatrick's Day
page.content: At eight o'clock my mum wakes me to get ready for school.I have my breakfast which is usually about twenty past eight and at eight thirty I leave for school. I arrive at school at 8.50am The school bell rings at 9.00am. We start work at 9.05pm and have morning break at 10.30am During that time I play football and talk to my friends Gordon,Colin and Stuart. From 10.50 until 12.20pm. we are back in school. My favourite subjects are English and Maths. We have lunch from 12.20pm to 1.20pm and go home for a lunch of beans on toast and coke.We're back in school from 1.20pm to 3.20pm. I play with my friends on my bike. (continued on next page)
